item.description:
Udupi Bhavin (don't ask me how to spell or pronounce it!) 10/7/09 at 7:00pm is sure to delight your taste buds without spending a lot. Reviewers say "Udupi is the best all-vegetarian restaurant in the area. A warning - it is no frills. Paper plates, plastic utensils, no art on the wall, cheap-o tables and chairs, cafeteria style - but the best damn food you will ever eat" and "The staff is hilarious and helpful with the intimidating menu. Try the Samosa Chaat, Batura is amazing, Mango Lassis - another yes. I've also had bisi bele bhath (??name??), it's a rice and lentil dish with vegetables, and the dosas are great. You really can't go wrong. Bring $20 and eat like a queen!"

Plenty of parking. No alcohol served, but you are invited to bring your own. I will collect $1.00 from attendees to defray costs of running this group. PLEASE BE CONSIDERATE AND SHOW UP IF YOU R.S.V.P. "YES"!!

Website: http://www.ctudupi.co...

Since this is cafeteria style - pay at the counter when you order, you may arrive anytime between 6:30 to 7:30, I plan to be there at 7:00pm. I am putting a limit of 20 people, but if you end up on a wait list - come join us anyway. The manager said he would make room. The more the merrier!

- Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Small place - easy to find us. Betsy/Meetup reservation

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: UDUPI BHAVIN 10/7/09 7:00 - WEDNESDAY
